episodes.title: I Escaped a Sex Cult: The Shocking Truth | NXIVM Survivor Sarah Edmondson ( (Part 2)
episodes.description:
This week, Betsy sits down with Sarah Edmondson — actress, author, podcast host, and survivor of the NXIVM/DOS sex cult — for Part 2 of this powerful conversation.
After unpacking the red flags in Part 1, Sarah dives into the moment everything snapped, how she planned her escape, and what it took to blow the whistle — from covert calls to the New York Times cover story that ignited a federal investigation.

In Part 2, we cover:

🔥 The exact breaking point that shattered the illusion
🧷 DOS, branding, and the truth about collateral (coercion & control)
🕵️‍♀️ Sarah’s escape plan: secrecy, safety, and smart sequencing
🗞️ Becoming a whistleblower & the NYT expose — what happened next
⚖️ Why coercion ≠ consent, and how the case became sex trafficking
🧠 Reclaiming your voice: therapy, survivor community, and real healing tools
🚩 Actionable red flags & a quick safety checklist for relationships, communities, and “self-improvement” groups
If you’ve ever wondered how someone gets out — and rebuilds — this is the roadmap.

🎧 Listen to Part 1 first if you missed it, then dive in here for the escape, expose, and recovery.

episodes.title: I Escaped a Sex Cult: Scary Tactics Cults Use to Recruit You | NXIVM Survivor Sarah Edmondson PART 1
episodes.description:
Betsy sits down with Sarah Edmondson — actress, author, podcast host, and survivor of the NXIVM cult — to uncover how she was recruited and why intelligent, ambitious women can be especially vulnerable to manipulation.

In Part 1, Sarah opens up about:


 🔹 Her early life as a “seeker” and what made her open to self-improvement groups
 🔹 The subtle tactics NXIVM used to draw people in and build dependency
 🔹 The MLM-style structure hidden beneath a “personal growth” program
 🔹 Red flags she missed — and how they apply not just to cults, but also to relationships, communities, and families
 🔹 Why anyone can fall prey to manipulation, and the psychology that keeps people stuck

👉 Part 2 (coming next week, 9/24) will reveal Sarah’s breaking point, the shocking branding ritual, and how she finally escaped to become a whistleblower.

If you’ve ever wondered how someone ends up in a cult — or how to recognize the red flags before it’s too late — this conversation is a must-listen.
